id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-educational-teen understands education itself as care work
did: did:web:elohim.host:content:value-scanner:teen:scenarios:educational-teen understands education itself as care work
title: Teen understands education itself as care work
description: Teen understands education itself as care work
content:
Scenario: Teen understands education itself as care work
    Given Jasmine invests time and effort in her education
    And education develops capability to serve future flourishing
    When educational_elohim frames her learning
    Then education should be understood as care work for her future self
    And investment in capability building should be recognized as care labor
    And she should learn that education serves collective as well as individual good
    And understand that her developing capabilities will serve community needs
    And see education as part of care economy, not separate from it
    And internalize that learning is valuable beyond market return
